text: Fred Wyers (1932-2006), was a male athlete who competed for England and Canada. ==Athletics career== He represented England in the triple jump at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Cardiff, Wales. ==Personal life== He emigrated to Canada in 1960, via Lethbridge Alberta and became the 1963 Canadian Triple Jump Champion. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2006 deaths Category:English male triple jumpers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1958 British Empire and Commonwealth Games
title: Fred Wyers
